text: How many Shin Megami Tensei games, the ps2 have?
author: Karlos Katu

text:
SMT3: Nocturne 
Raidou Kuzunoha 1&2
Digital Devil Saga 1&2
Persona 3 and 4

That's all of them I believe.

author: Karlos Katu

text: Meguro went with a bit of an Eye of the Tiger intro right there. Great buildup, great theme! I do feel like he could have built on it a bit more towards the end, especially with a fadeout like that which gives that unfinished feeling. Still, it's definitely one of the best theme in the soundtrack.
